eui64 [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mdlayher/eui64.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mdlayher/eui64) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/mdlayher/eui64/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/r/mdlayher/eui64?branch=master) [![GoDoc](http://godoc.org/github.com/mdlayher/eui64?status.svg)](http://godoc.org/github.com/mdlayher/eui64)
=====

Package `eui64` enables creation and parsing of Modified EUI-64 format
interface identifiers, as described in RFC 4291, Section 2.5.1.  MIT
Licensed.
